attributes.action: apply pressure to the banks to force them to pass on the recent interest rate cuts in October/November 2008 to all customers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the British tax payer are paying and will be supporting British banks in thier hour of need - it is only fair that the banks reflect the help being given by the British tax payer ie to pass on the interest cuts to all customers

rejection.details: This petition overlaps with several already in existence: http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/BOEratecuts/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
